content: तर्क् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (तर्कयति-ते, तर्कित) {@--1@} To suppose, guess, suspect, believe, conjecture, infer; त्वं तावत्कतमां तर्कयसि <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; <ls>Me. 96.</ls> {@--2@} To reason, speculate about, reflect. {@--3@} To consider or regard as (with two <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--4@} To think of, intend, mean, have in view; (पातुं) त्वं चेदच्छरफटिकविशदं तर्कयेरितर्यगंभः <ls>Me. 51.</ls> {@--5@} To ascertain. {@--6@} To shine. {@--7@} To speak.
